entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is the student who is being bullied by Snape. He is described as going scarlet and having his face go redder when Professor Lupin speaks up for him.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is the teacher who bullies Neville in front of other teachers. He is described as leaving the room after being spoken to by Professor Lupin.

entities.name: miss granger
entities.description: Miss Granger is mentioned as someone who gives instructions to Harry, but she is not directly involved in the scene.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student who glares at Snape for bullying Neville. He is not directly involved in the rest of the scene.

entities.name: professor lupin
entities.description: Professor Lupin is the teacher who speaks up for Neville and tries to reassure him that there is nothing to worry about.

entities.name: boggart
entities.description: The boggart is a monster that is hiding in the old wardrobe. It is described as causing a sudden wobble and banging off the wall.

relationships.description: Snape bullies Neville in front of other teachers.
Professor Lupin has a boggart hiding in the old wardrobe.
Neville is expected to assist Professor Lupin with the operation.
